error-messages.no-answer-found: No answer could be loaded. Try again?

default-responses.initial-message: Hello, I am Coronabot. I answer questions about the number of cases of COVID-19 in Germany. \I am not an official source of information, but a demonstrator. The official German chatbot on COVID-19 is available at chatbot.it.bund.de. This demonstrator was developed at Anhalt University of Applied Sciences. More information on this regard is presented in the section.

credits:
This application was developed at the Department of Computer Science and Languages of the Anhalt University of Applied Sciences as part of the course "Question Answering & Chatbots" under the direction of Prof. Dr. Andreas Both. Supervision was provided by Prof. Both and Aleksandr Perevalov, as well as project partners from the Federal Ministry of the Interior, for Construction and Home Affairs and ITZBund. This is a scientific demonstrator, the official German COVID-19 chatbot is available here.

Projekt Team

The project team consisted of the following students:
  • Backend: Johannes Richard Bartsch, Paul Heinze, Rostislav Iudin, Johannes Rudolf Herkner and Tim Schrader
  • Frontend: Jonas Wunsch
